thread.title: Kenny De La Rosa
thread.title_full: BPI Sports reviewed by Kenny De La Rosa

author: Kenny De La Rosa
title: Kenny De La Rosa
text: I've been taking BPI products for a few weeks now and I am impressed with the progress that I am making. I do see change. I have become a little more leaner. I would recommend these products to friends or to anyone who is looking for supplements to help them reach their goal.
